definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
(bird species of China) Steller's eider (Polysticta stelleri)

sentences.english: In the marmoset kitchen, Peter prepares the monkeys' daily menu.
sentences.chinese: 彼得在廚房中爲絨猴準備喫的。

sentences.english: Tremor disease (TD) is the most serious epizootic of the crab in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 而顫抖病是近年來中華絨螯蟹最嚴重的流行病。

sentences.english: The extraordinary properties of eiderdown make it appear as a cohesive, soft mass.
sentences.chinese: 鳧絨的特殊性能使其看起來是有附着力而柔軟的絨團。

sentences.english: The raising and dyeing of the denim are presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了雙面牛仔絨的起絨及印染全過程。

sentences.english: The content of kalium was more than sodium.
sentences.chinese: 中華絨螯蟹鉀的含量明顯高於鈉。

sentences.english: Mini-skirts are ruffled and flirty in denim or suede with laser-cut detailing.
sentences.chinese: 迷你短裙是嬌媚的牛仔布或有精緻激光雕刻絨麪皮。

sentences.english: Finding a way to dye and finish imitate_ chammy .
sentences.chinese: 找到一種緯彈仿麂皮絨的染整加工方法。

sentences.english: The 2002 Gold Label Coonawarra Cabernet Sauvignon is rich velvet red with purple hues in the glass.
sentences.chinese: 此酒有着紅絲絨般的色澤，略泛紫色光澤。

sentences.english: SBR FLEECE design for discreet padding with hydrophobic properties to keep you dry.
sentences.chinese: SBR絨的設計與疏水性能，讓你乾的謹慎填充。

sentences.english: A quilt stuffed with the down of the eider duck.
sentences.chinese: 這條被子是用絨鴨毛做芯子的。

sentences.english: Silk and eiderdown make a perfect match in a comforter.
sentences.chinese: 用絲綢與鳧絨做被子簡直是絕配。

sentences.english: Nubuck with split suede leather upper is waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂與分裂絨麪皮革鞋面是防水的。

sentences.english: The plush does not look like the counter sample and is totally agglutinated.
sentences.chinese: 長毛絨與相應的樣品不符，絨都是年在一起的。

sentences.english: Then, they decided to do the yak fluff business after a long-time consideration and research.
sentences.chinese: 經過多番分析和調校，才選定犛牛絨生意。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
